title: Blood.Diner.1987.XviD.hyphield
description:
One of the greatest fucking horror movies of all time. The Tutman boys run a vegiterian cafe where they serve vegiterians. They dig up their dead uncle & put his brain in a jar so he can give them instructions on how to resurrect the goddess Sheetar. Sheetar must be compiled from the body parts of many immoral girls & brought to life at the blood buffet.

The soundtrack for this movie is awesome. Jackie Kong also directed a movie called Night Patrol which I believe inspired Police Academy. Blood Diner is an obscure little film that is very hard to find. The first copy I ever got was a VHS I bought from a pawn shop on a whim for $1.00. It was probably the best dollar I ever spent. I own this movie on DVD, but I wanted to download it so I can share it with the rest of the world.

Please reseed & enjoy this timeless classic.
